function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for prolonged virus survival in sewer lines due to temperature changes","Impact":"Increased risk of contamination and spread of the virus in the built environment","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection and maintenance of sewer lines, monitoring of wastewater for early detection","Technologies":"Temperature-controlled sewer systems, advanced wastewater treatment technologies","People":"Residents, public health officials, wastewater treatment personnel","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, wastewater management organizations"}]}
